title: Darkness & Daemons: The Watchful
description: The Watchful introduces Rick and his hunter buddies Scott, Ron, and Jarren. They are camping the night at Shadow Pines Forest when a time pulse hits locking them into a repeating time sequence. Rick, at the time of the pulse, is separated from the group and is forced to leave them behind. The hunters become the hunted as a massive beasts tracks them down. Meanwhile, Rick is forced to hide inside an abandoned shed.Previous Event: The InsatiableNext Event: The GatePlease Note: This literature is written in present tense and is led through action.
author: M.T. Dismuke
